document.full_text: the parents of a 6-year-old girl who got a pat-down at a new orleans airport security checkpoint earlier this month said on wednesday that there should be different screening procedures for children.
document.title: parents of 6-year-old outraged over airport patdown
lines_and_colors: the parents of a 6-year-old girl who got a pat-down at a new orleans airport security checkpoint earlier this month said on wednesday that there should be different screening procedures for children.
